gadgets-validate-json: JSON pɛllɛ kyaane la kyɛ ba toŋ. Pakegye gagyɛte poɔ yoŋ la ka a tona.
gadgets-validate-es6default: Gagyɛtere naŋ irikɔɛ ES6 koŋ baŋ eŋ difiliti eŋɛ.
gadgets-validate-noentrypoint: Pakegye flag ka ba leɛ kaare tere aŋa gampɛle sɛgeraa pɛllɛ zaa naŋ ba kyaane iri.
gadgets-validate-noscripts: Ba leɛ la kpaare ko gampɛle sɛgere, bonso a gagyɛte ŋa sɛte type=styles.
gadgets-validate-stylepeers: Kpaare leɛ ko la gagyɛte sentaa, bonso aŋa e la gɔɔroŋ-yoŋ gagyɛte. Sɛte type=general na e zuo.
gadgets-validate-scriptsnotallowed: Pɛll sɛgere ane dɛta pɛllɛ ba de toŋ ne, bonso a gagyɛte ŋa sɛte type=styles.
gadgets-validate-invalidjs: Gampɛle sɛgere $1 ba toŋ, a yi yelbulo model naŋ ba tona "$2".
gadgets-validate-invalidcss: Gɔɔrompɛle $1 ba toŋ, a yi yelbulo model naŋ ba tona "$2".
gadgets-validate-invalidjson: Dɛta peegyi $1 ba de toŋ ne, a yi yelbulo ba tonne model "$2"
gadgets-validate-nopeer: Kpaare leɛ ko la gagyɛte sentaa "$1", bonso o ba tona.
gadgets-validate-invalidpeer: Gagyɛte sentaa "$1" yɛlɛ yinni la, bonso o ba e gɔɔroŋ-yoŋ gagyɛte.
gadgets-validate-invalidactions: Yɛlɛ ama {{PLURAL:$2|action is|eebore}} ba leɛ teɛrɛ: $1
gadgets-validate-invalidcontentmodels: A yelbulo ŋa {{PLURAL:$2|model does|model ba}} ba tona: $1
gadgets-validate-invalidnamespaces: Yoevori ama {{PLURAL:$2|number does|nambare ba}} ba tona: $1
